notes: list_events tool completed (internal/toolset/event/list/) with FR-010-FR-016 passing. All 6 reviewer agents passed with no critical issues. Supports created_by_me filter, period filters (start/end with 'today' or RFC3339), combined filters. Sorting delegated to service per design. Limit enforcement (5 when partial range, 0 when both specified). Response limited to FR-016 fields with JST RFC3339 times. Tests cover AC-006-AC-011. Architecture review identified minor issues (duplicate interfaces, duplicate constants) that are non-blocking. Next session: create event.go factory and integrate event tools with main.go, then verify remaining requirements (FR-001-FR-008, NFR-001, NFR-003).
